h1_title: How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor
content: Depending on when you reach the village, you might find there are brand-new Weapons and Armors to craft as well.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Zodiac_Village_and_Upgrade_Armor.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor', specifically from the subsection 'How to Upgrade Armor'.
The content is as follows:
Depending on when you reach the village, you might find there are brand-new Weapons and Armors to craft as well.
